title: New exhibition to showcase different textile techniques (Hurstville City Council)
text: ( Source : Hurstville City Council ) 13 Oct 2015 Mayor of Hurstville , Cr Vince Badalati is inviting members of the community to come along to Hurstville Museum & Gallery 's newest exhibition entitled Journey 's focusing on textile arts which
